description: This resource schema represents the Profiling Group resource in the Amazon CodeGuru Profiler service.

ProfilingGroupArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws([-\w]*):codeguru-profiler:(([a-z]+-)+[0-9]+):([0-9]{12}):profilingGroup/[^.]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

IamArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws([-\w]*):iam::([0-9]{12}):[\S]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. The allowed characters across services are: letters, numbers, and spaces representable in UTF-8, and the following characters: + - = . _ : / @.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. The allowed characters across services are: letters, numbers, and spaces representable in UTF-8, and the following characters: + - = . _ : / @.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. The allowed characters across services are: letters, numbers, and spaces representable in UTF-8, and the following characters: + - = . _ : / @.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. The allowed characters across services are: letters, numbers, and spaces representable in UTF-8, and the following characters: + - = . _ : / @.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ChannelId.description: Unique identifier for each Channel in the notification configuration of a Profiling Group
ChannelId.markdownDescription:
Unique identifier for each Channel in the notification configuration of a Profiling Group

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: [a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{12}  
Update requires: No interruption

ChannelUri.description: Unique arn of the resource to be used for notifications. We support a valid SNS topic arn as a channel uri.
ChannelUri.markdownDescription:
Unique arn of the resource to be used for notifications. We support a valid SNS topic arn as a channel uri.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws([-\w]*):[a-z-]+:(([a-z]+-)+[0-9]+)?:([0-9]{12}):[^.]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Channel.description: Notification medium for users to get alerted for events that occur in application profile. We support SNS topic as a notification channel.
Channel.markdownDescription:
Notification medium for users to get alerted for events that occur in application profile. We support SNS topic as a notification channel.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ProfilingGroupName.description: The name of the profiling group.
ProfilingGroupName.markdownDescription:
The name of the profiling group.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^[\w-]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

ComputePlatform.description: The compute platform of the profiling group.
ComputePlatform.markdownDescription:
The compute platform of the profiling group.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: Default | AWSLambda  
Update requires: Replacement

AgentPermissions.description: The agent permissions attached to this profiling group.

Principals.description: The principals for the agent permissions.
Principals.markdownDescription:
The principals for the agent permissions.

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

AnomalyDetectionNotificationConfiguratio.description: Configuration for Notification Channels for Anomaly Detection feature in CodeGuru Profiler which enables customers to detect anomalies in the application profile for those methods that represent the highest proportion of CPU time or latency

Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption
